text: 14:28 Luk 24:51; Jon 14:3; 14:12; 14:18; 16:28; 20:17; Filipai 2:6Ezɨ ia akar kɨ ia ganɨngizir kam baregha gɨfa, ‘Kɨ ia ategha zui, egh kɨ ua ia bagh izam.’ Egh ia bar na gifueghtɨ, akar kam ia damutɨ ia bar akuegham. Afeziamɨn gavgavim bar ekevegha nan gavgavim gafira, kamaghɨn, kɨ uan Afeziam bagha zui.
